about.historyText: Laemthong Syndicate Co., Ltd. was established over 60 years ago with a vision to become Thailand's leading importer and distributor of high-quality welding and cutting equipment. Over the decades, we have built strong partnerships with world-class manufacturers and developed an extensive dealer network nationwide.
about.missionText: To deliver high-quality products at competitive prices, backed by excellent after-sales service, supporting the growth of Thai industry.
about.reason1Desc: As a direct importer from manufacturers, we offer the most competitive pricing in the market.
about.reason2Desc: Our experienced technicians provide maintenance, repair, and consultation services.
about.reason3Desc: We exclusively carry products from internationally certified leading brands.
about.reason4Desc: Our dealer and service center network covers the entire country.
